website_summaries.verdict: A heritage sneaker with modern updates has given the Sperry Captain’s CVO the makings of iconic footwear. The Sperry Captain’s CVO might have been one of the most bestselling and pioneering brands in the market as it displays modern updates into the vintage kicks.  Also convincing a lot of conscientious buyers to snag a pair of these low-top canvas sneakers is its affordable price of only $60 for men’s and women’s sneakers.
pros: A considerable majority of wearers comment that the Sperry Captain’s CVO is incredibly comfortable and a great sneaker option for the spring and summer months
A good number of users praise its styling versatility because the classic silhouette matches perfectly with other clothes
A lot of wearers say it fits true to size and can be worn fresh out of the box with or without socks
Some people give compliments to wearers of the Sperry Captain’s CVO as its muted colors are stylish and work well with a lot of casual clothing
Several users post positive reviews on how the rubber-soled sneaker is lightweight and flexible for walking around many locations in a day
A few users say the stylish and minimalist low-top sneaker is budget friendly
Most customers think the shoe runs true to size and needs no break-in to feel the comfort immediately
One commenter praises its soft cushioning and removable footbed that allows customization by replacing them with comfortable custom orthotics or inserts
Some wearers say the wave is siping at the outsole results to a fantastic shoe grip even on slippery surfaces
One customer appreciates the fact that the shoes come with an extra pair of laces
cons: A few complaints mentioned that the upper material rubs on the ankle causing discomfort
One reviewer felt disappointed that the upper material felt stiff at the ankles resulting in some discomfort after a few days of use

customer_reviews.title: Tread ripping off bottom of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes for 17 days and the white non marking tread is already ripping/peeling off the bottom of the shoe in several places. Totally unacceptable. Hard to believe this is a Sperry product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: squeak...squeak...squeak
customer_reviews.text: Someone had written a review stating that these shoes are made for walking on a wet surface of a boat, which I ignored, so unless hearing a fairly loud squeak with every step appeals to you when you're not on a boat, do not buy these shoes. Sperry should have included this in the product description. Also, there's no padding at all around the top of the shoe so they are very uncomfortable, and the support is poor. You get what you pay for with these, and the low price shows. After returning these, I bought, Sperry's Wahoo CVO Fashion Sneaker, which are great, and cost just $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: jayday

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get them wet
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable shoe, but unfortunately the first time I was caught in the rain wearing these, the front rubber piece that’s glued to the body of the shoe detached in several places around the front part. I was very surprised seeing how Sperry is a boat shoe, and should be able to handle a little water.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price, but forget about washing them
customer_reviews.text: I bought the marine blue model. They look and fit as expected and the construction is good. After a trip abroad they were very dirty, so I washed them by hand in a bucket of water. Big mistake. They came out clean, but purple in color. For this type of shoes, I think it's imperative that you should be able to wash them without losing the color.
customer_reviews.author: Estimed_customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose another style Sperry
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed I have had more Sperrys than I can remember. Really hard to get on and off. The insole comes out every time I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Owens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to care for
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are my 4th pair (different colors) ! They are very comfortable out of the box and the fit is always consistent. They are durable and easy to clean if the do get dirty. At this price, I should order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Being green doesn’t have to be imaginary with Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Watched a PBS special on plastic waster being used by Sperry and the clean up of remote islands. The recycling of the plastics cleaned up are then used to creat mayoerisl used in building these shoes so had to have them as profits used to clean up ocean waste
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe but it's cheap
customer_reviews.text: I would have rather spent an extra $25 to get a better shoe since this has pretty much no support and is super thin. But if you want a cheap shoe that looks good, this is a good option, it just doesn't appear to be good for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Zach M

customer_reviews.title: Quality 5 Stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Sperrys run about a half size larger than regular so if you wear a 9 1/2 get a 9. Great shoes with a fresh summer look and style but still comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Erik in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Actually very comfortable. The only negative side is to do to there not being much arch support, they can be a hassle trying to get on. A shoe horn would suffice.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought them twice
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe - Bought in 2 color combos multiple times. Amazon makes it easy to repeat the order when I've worn them down and need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Stephens

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought them Twice
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe - Bought in 2 color combos multiple times. Amazon makes it easy to repeat the order when I've worn them down and need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, size runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes, they run a bit small however. Very stiff tongue and they crinkle at the toes. I’ll update my review after a few more wears.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of shoes that aren't athletic shoes or boots. Very comfortable, forefoot portion bends with each step. I have 3 pairs
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought because they used recycled material. Haven't worn because they really do look like bowling or clown shoes in person. I love sperry, just not these.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Fin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh look
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes & I get compliments everytime I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisFurman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking but too narrow for me. I loved that they are made out of recycled bottles. Had to send them back. Wish Speery made these in wide sizes
customer_reviews.author: redamma

customer_reviews.title: Classic topsiders.
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say. Classic topsiders. Fit is good. Style is timeless. Good all around boat shoe. Keep in mind, these are not your walking around town shoes. They are intended for wet slippery surfaces in that capacity they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Was so glad to find them. They fit as expected. HIghly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Wore Vanns all my life. These are so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jehilliker

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. The back of the heel is a bit stiff. Probably just needs a little break in period. Looks sharp though and comfy to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Red Dye Stains
customer_reviews.text: They backside is flimsy but the shows look great. The only problem is that they eternally stain socks red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amaze balls
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting, sleek, light weight, grip tight shoe. Better than imagined and can’t wait to get more.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: they seem to run just a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11D. The shaft is very tight and, as a result, the shoes seem to be a bit small. They may break-in over time, but they are a bit too tight initially. I suspect I would have been better off with an 11 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I like em
customer_reviews.text: I have had Sperry’s before and liked them. I have spent a few days walking around in these and they pass the test. They are a little more converse all star style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put the shoe on my foot. Fits well once on. I think the opening is just too short for typical human anatomy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great looking shoe. Only downside is they get dirty fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for work and play.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Sperry CVO shoes are extremely comfortable. I can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Feet hurt!!
customer_reviews.text: Too small they hurt my foot specially my leg foot wore once now there in closet .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great simple shoes. No flair but more comfortable than comparable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: There stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like how they were a little loose so I could feel comfortable when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Aramis

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect comfortable fit, plus compliments on how I looked in them!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: tight fit
customer_reviews.text: this shoe has no firm support at the end and is difficult to put on wout a shoehorn
customer_reviews.author: Bob Galiszewski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. And side of shoe cuts into foot a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kirt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve Kept them..
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great material but the deadline given considering how much I work wasn’t fair so I had to return them :-(
customer_reviews.author: Martavious

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes - it does have "real" laces though - ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes - it does have "real" laces though - the pics just have them tucked into the shoe. Was expecting slip ons with faux laces, but this turned out not to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Couture

product_meta.title: Sperry Men's Captains CVO Sneaker
product_meta.description: Captain CVO "Founded in 1935 by Paul Sperry, after a near death experience on a boat the Sperry Top Sider shoe was born and it was the first of it's kind as a boat shoe. Fast forward eight decades later, and Sperry boat shoes have evolved into sea-worthy, fashionable preppy shoes coveted by men, women, and children across the globe for their unique styles, comfort and durability. Shop for Sperry boat shoes here,and choose from a wide selection of hand-crafted footwear including leather and canvas sandals, leather and canvas boat shoes, leather loafers, printed espadrilles, sneakers, oxfords or boots in every style, print, color and size available.
feature_bullets: Original 1935 design updated with modern comfort
Ultra lightweight and flexible outsole with molded Wave-Siped traction
Abrasion resistent soft lining for less break-in time
